snippet: Democratic lawyers had asked last month for an emergency ruling on whether a dozen fund-raising tactics used by super PACs should be considered legal
abstract: Federal Election Commission postpones issuing decision on legality of dozen fund-raising tactics used by super PACs, which have been dominant force in 2016 presidential campaign so far.
lead_paragraph: Democratic lawyers had asked last month for an emergency ruling on whether a dozen fund-raising tactics used by super PACs should be considered legal

headline.print_headline: Panel Delays a Decision on Spending in ’16 Races
headline.main: F.E.C. Panel Delays a Decision on Spending in ’16 Races
